judges: Before Bell, O. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Beckman to pay costs.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Beauchamp v. Gonzales (et al., Appellant).
Argued November 17, 1967.
Before Bell, O. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
reargument refused February 1, 1968.
